For further details visit the website. The College is under observation by the CSI Diocese of Vellore. The College offers B.A. in Economics, B.Sc. in Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and Zoology. The College also offers Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses in the Shift – II which is a self- financing stream. Some of the courses under this shift are B.Com, B.Sc. in Computer Science, B.B.A., B.C.A., etc. M.Phil and Ph.D. Degrees in the Postgraduate Departments of the College are also offered at the college. Admissions to the courses will be done based on merit (10+2) for UG and Academic performance at UG level for PG followed by Personal Interview with the Diocese.
